publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1972 Dennis Canavan: Congratulations to Falkirk FC—That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk Football Club on winning the Bell’s League Challenge Cup and commends both Falkirk FC and Ross County FC on providing an excellent and memorable cup final.

S2M-1972 Congratulations to Falkirk FC (lodged on 8 November 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Christine May*, John Swinburne*, Bill Butler*, Ms Sandra White*, David Mundell*, Robin Harper*, Tommy Sheridan*, Brian Adam*, Tricia Marwick*, Rosie Kane*, Margaret Mitchell*, Eleanor Scott*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-1972 Congratulations to Falkirk FC (lodged on 8 November 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1972 Congratulations to Falkirk FC (lodged on 8 November 2004) Trish Godman*

S2M-1972 Dennis Canavan: Congratulations to Falkirk FC—That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk Football Club on winning the Bell’s League Challenge Cup and commends both Falkirk FC and Ross County FC on providing an excellent and memorable cup final. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Christine May, John Swinburne, Bill Butler, Ms Sandra White, David Mundell, Robin Harper, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Tricia Marwick, Rosie Kane, Margaret Mitchell, Eleanor Scott, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Mr Frank McAveety, Mr Brian Monteith, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Trish Godman
S2M-1972 Congratulations to Falkirk FC (lodged on 8 November 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1972 Congratulations to Falkirk FC (lodged on 8 November 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1972 Congratulations to Falkirk FC (lodged on 8 November 2004) Murray Tosh*
S2M-1972 Congratulations to Falkirk FC (lodged on 8 November 2004) Cathy Peattie*
